items.content_html: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
items.title: R0LEX7/RolexDB: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
